home.title: Home
home.welcomeMessage: Hi! I'm Amir Maghami, a Web Developer.
home.about: I specialize in frontend technologies, with a focus on Vue.js and Nuxt.js. With over 5 years of experience, I have developed projects ranging from ERP systems to Open Banking APIs.

about.title: About Me
about.content: I'm Amir Maghami, a web developer with over 5 years of experience in frontend technologies, focused on Vue and Nuxt.

projects.title: Projects
projects.content: Here are some of my important projects. These include applications based on Vue.js, Nuxt.js, and other modern frameworks. You can check the code and more project details on my GitHub.

repo1.name: ERP Management Panel
repo1.description: An ERP project for managing orders, inventory, and customer data.

repo2.name: HR Survey System
repo2.description: A human resources survey system for evaluating employee performance and gathering feedback.

repo3.name: Open Banking API
repo3.description: An API implementation for Open Banking systems that allows data sharing with banks.

meta.description: Amir Maghami's projects include ERP management panels, HR survey systems, and Open Banking projects.
meta.keywords: Amir Maghami's projects, ERP panel, HR survey system, Open Banking

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.content: Throughout my career, I have achieved significant milestones, including obtaining a swimming coach certificate, completing specialized courses in MongoDB and NEST, and contributing to major projects like ERP panels and Open Banking.
